name: Strength
description:
A measure of a characters raw physical strength
- Determines strength of melee attacks
- Determines Carry capacity
- Ability to resist physical attacks
- Modifier for physical abilities
 
Governs the following trade skills:
- Weaponsmithing
- Armoursmithing
- Mining
- Forestry

name: Agility
description:
- Increases critical hit chance
        - Increases accuracy

name: Endurance
description:
- Determines health points
        - Ability to resist bleeding and poison effects

name: Personality
description:
- Improves quest rewards
        - Improves prices with traders
